A Scout is Trustworthy ... by keeping promises to friends and family
A Scout is Trustworthy ... by returning lost items to their rightful owner
A Scout is Loyal ... by standing by their friends in good times and bad
A Scout is Loyal ... by supporting their pack and fellow scouts
A Scout is Loyal ... by showing respect for their country and community
A Scout is Helpful ... by volunteering in their community

A Scout is Kind ... by comforting a friend who is upset
A Scout is Kind ... by being gentle with animals
A Scout is Obedient ... by following their parents' rules
A Scout is Obedient ... by listening to their scout leader's instructions
A Scout is Obedient ... by respecting authority and guidelines
A Scout is Cheerful ... by staying positive during challenging times
A Scout is Cheerful ... by bringing joy to others with a smile
A Scout is Cheerful ... by finding the good in every situation
A Scout is Thrifty ... by saving money for important goals

A Scout is Thrifty ... by reusing and recycling whenever possible
A Scout is Brave ... by standing up for what is right

A Scout is Clean ... by tidying up their room every weekend

A Scout is Reverent ... by showing gratitude for what they have

content.heroSubtitle: Beautiful wreaths, poinsettias, and holiday plants
content.aboutText: Cub Scout Pack 182 of Readington, NJ is raising funds through our annual holiday sale. We offer beautiful wreaths, festive poinsettias, and other holiday plants. Each purchase supports our scouts' activities and helps develop future leaders in our community.

faq.question: How do I pay for my order?
faq.answer: We accept payment via Zelle to threebridgespack182@gmail.com (Boy Scouts of America). You can also pay with cash or check for in-person orders entered by scouts.

faq.question: When will I receive my wreath?
faq.answer: All wreaths are made to order. Pickup is scheduled for December 15, 2025 (tentative). You'll receive an email with final pickup details and location confirmation.

faq.question: Can I support a specific scout?
faq.answer: Yes! If you received a link from a scout, your purchase will automatically be attributed to them. You can also ask any scout for their unique link or QR code.

faq.question: What if I just want to make a donation?
faq.answer: We appreciate donations! You can add a donation to Three Bridges Reformed Church during checkout. All donations are welcome and help support our local community.
